page.title: 19GRAYS, ROAD ACCIDENTS
page.content: A recent report by road safety experts in Thurrock has pin-pointed a worrying increase in the number of road accidents, and this is alarming the people of Grays. Top of the black-spot list is Orsett Road in Grays, where 31 accidents involving death or injury have happened since 1982. The council's engineering services committee has now decided to give priority to the site between the Thameside Theatre and Park View Gardens and attempt to make improvements that will reduce the number of road accidents. It was predicted at the committee meeting that if the problem were to be ignored, it was estimated that 1000 accidents would occur over the next 10 years, involving 1300 casualties.
